rows.d: a «care», a state of being troubled.
N is/are «convenient»/no «trouble», e.g. could you do this for me, if it's --.
K is «troublesome» in V, as a troublesome person.
will soon (be)/«be about to»/«just going to» ..., a tense op.
in a «while»/«later on»/«presently», after that, a mod. phrase.
in a «while»/«later on»/«presently», after this, a mod. phrase.
«just after»/as «soon as»/no «sooner than», before event clauses.
«just then»/«momentarily»/«right now»/«thereupon»/«whereupon»/«upon which», «whereat», just after this, a mod. phrase.
«just then»/«thereupon», just after that, a mod. phrase.
will «eventually» (be a), a modified tense oper.
«later on»/«long after this», a mod. phrase.
«later on»/«after a long time»/«long after that», a mod. phrase.
«five» (5) (of), a description quantifier. E.g. {Fe le fumna pa merji} -- (Some) Five of the women were married; {Fe fumna pa hijra} -- (Some) Five women were here independently. Cf., {fecu}.
B is an «episode» of affair F.

«five»/«quintuple»/«quintet», a «pentad» of ... acting together, an indefinite set describer. E.g. {Fecu mrenu pa hijra} -- Some five men/A group of five were here together. Cf., {Fe mrenu pa hijra} -- Some five men were here independently.
«f», Latin lower case letter, one of a pool of symbols.
K «enter» record B to file/program/system F, press return/enter key.
C is a «memory capacity» of system F.
K «load into memory», loads B into memory F, default system RAM.
B is a «modem» with speed C.
K communicate(s) P by «modem» to D via system/network V.
K is «knowledgeable», knows much about B.
N is a «fact»/«actuality» about event V according to observer(s) K.
K «acknowledge»/«corroborate» fact N about event V as observed by S.
B is a «file» containing ... {fekveo} <{fek(to) + ve(sl)o} -- fact container> is a file.
P is a «sediment»/«precipitate» in F produced by process V.
B is a «waterfall» of river system F.
B «fall» to D from S in gravity field N.
K «fall in» to D from S via V.
K is a «paratrooper» of military group F.
B is a «feline», one of the cats.
B is a «precipice» of F, distinguished from cliff {vrelai}.

B is a/the «marchioness» of domain N.

«M»'Lady/«My Lady»/O Lady of me, Respected One, a form used by inferiors to address the female peerage; cf. {Surpoi}.
B is a/the «princess»/«duchess»/«marchioness»/«countess»/«baroness» of S, any peeress, identify by number.
B is a/the «countess» of domain N.
B is a/the «viscountess» of domain N.
G is more «ferrous»/contains more «iron» than J does.
B is a piece/quantity of «iron ore».
K is a «blacksmith», a worker in iron.
D «know»(s) B from source S, book learning as opposed to experience ({spedja}).
B are actually «related» to/«occur» in the same world as F according to point-of view/observer/metaphysics/reality N.
F is a «computer memory» of type B.
B is «factually»/«empirically» true under epistemology N.
a «truth», an empirical truth under rules ....
B is a «quintet»/«pentad»/«five member» subset of set F, a cardinal predicate; e.g. {Da fera lea golfu} -- X is a fivesome at golf/of golfers.
C measures five «cents», 5/100ths of monetary unit F.
V is an «affair»/«matter»/«concern»/«interest» of person(s) D.
«engage»/«involve»/«concern»/«interest»/«matter to» ..., involve ..., as in an affair.
B is a «Friday» of week/month F.

B is a «battalion»/«air force», the 5th smallest military unit in some larger «military organization»/«force» F, without service designation, otherwise {lan} -- (land), {mur} -- (sea), {ker} -- (air), or {spa} -- (space) is prefixed; e.g. {kerforgru} -- air force. Cf. {surgru}.
V is a/the «fifth» term/member of series ..., an ordinal predicate.
B is a «pentagon» with vertices C.

B is a «lieutenant colonel»/«commander»/etc. commanding/«attached to» military unit F, within a military service addressed without service designation, otherwise {lan} -- (land), {mur} -- (sea), {ker} -- (air), or {spa} -- (space) is prefixed; e.g. {murferkoi} -- naval commander. Use {surkoi}. q.v., for officers in general.
B is a «May» of year F.
B is some «fermium», a transuranic element (Fm).
B is a/the «duke» of domain N.
G is more «fertile»/«fruitful» than J for crops B.
a «fertility», a state of being fertile.
a «fertility», a prop. of a specific soil.

B is a «staff sergeant» «controling»/«attached to» military unit F, within a military service addressed without service designation, otherwise {lan} -- (land), {mur} -- (sea), {ker} -- (air), or {spa} -- (space) is prefixed; e.g. {murfertro} -- petty officer first class.

the mark of «Latin» lower case vowel names, as in {afi}/{efi}/{ifi}/etc.
the mark of «ordinals», as in {nefi}, firstly.

ever «since», «thereafter», this time<, a modifying phrase.>.

«since», for a long time after, with clauses.
ever «since», for a long time after, terms.

«comrade»/«brother»/«sister», an attitudinal indicating comradeship/friendship or the intimacy of fellow members/co workers; part of the series '{rie}/{kae}/{nue}/{fie}/{die}', q.v.; always used after a designation/vocative. E.g. '{Djan, Fie}' -- 'John, Friend' used as the salutation of a letter. (DIE).

container B is «partly full» to the extent C.
«four» (4) (of), a description quantifier. E.g. {Fo le fumna pa merji} -- (Some) Four of the women were married; {Fo fumna pa hijra} -- (Some) Four women were here independently. Cf., {focu}.

«four»/«quadruple»/«quartet», a «tetrad» of ... acting together, an indefinite set describer. E.g. {Focu mrenu pa hijra} -- Some four men/A group of four men were here together. Cf., {Fo mrenu pa hijra} -- Some four men were here independently.
N «crumple» D, nonintentional cause to be full of wrinkles.

B is a «fold»/«tuck»/«crease» in/of F ({Da --}. X is a fold like shape.).
B is a «wrinkle», the mark left by a fold.
N «wrinkle» D, nonintentional cause "Time wrinkles the face".
B is a «flap», a folded piece of F.
«must»/is «obliged to» ..., objective sense used before predicates (PA). E.g. {Mi foi godzi da} -- I must go to X. Cf. {oa} for subjective sense: {oa mi godzi da} -- I must go to X.
«in»/«during»/«under» ..., used before event/state terms to specify the conditions of an obligation.
K «force to walk» B to D from S via V.
